text: Ðis is þara XXX hidæ boc æt Beorhtanwylle þæ Eadred cing gæbocode Æþelgeard his þegne on ece yrfe.
Ðis synt þa landgemæra þæra XXX hida to Beorhtanwille.
Ærest of þam more be westan þam tune on þa ealdan dic.
West andlang dic on þa hæþenan byrgylsas.
Þonne east andlang weges of þam wege on ænne littelne þorn.
Of þam þorne east & hwon suð on ge rihte to þam wege to gafer bice.
Þanon norð be þam and heafdon oð þa lace.
Andlang lace ut on temese oð midne stream.
Andlang ea.
Of þa ealdan stret.
Ford andlang gea to holan wylle.
Of holan wylle.
On holan weg.
Of holan wege on bric weg.
Of bric wege.
On ærnincgweg.
Of ærningewege on meosdene.
Of meosdene on meldanige.
Eastewerdne.
On sandlace.
Andlang sand lice to ceolesige to þam hnottan stocce.
Of þam stocce norð andlang gybhilde to þære ealdan dic.
Þær we her on fengan.
Þonne ligcaþ be norðam þam porte XXXVI ækera yrþ landes.
And X æceras mæde.
And I myln.
And binnan porte fram eastgeate on norð healfe strete on þæne broc.
And VII heorþas butan þam & þreo cyrican.
